hero_title: Find your dream car from Japan
hero_subtitle: Direct purchase from auctions & dealers. Transparent inspections, shipment support and fast documentation.
how_it_works_browse_desc: Search by make, model or price and shortlist cars you like.
how_it_works_inspect_desc: We assist with inspection reports and bidding at auction.
how_it_works_shipping_desc: Door-to-door shipping and paperwork handled for you.
cta_title: Need help buying a car from Japan?
cta_subtitle: Our experts will guide you through auctions, export and shipping.
footer_desc: Huda Trading Japan Co., Ltd. located at {{address}}.
about_subtitle: We are passionate about connecting buyers with the best Japanese cars. Our mission is to make car buying simple, transparent, and hassle-free.
mission_desc1: We aim to bring the most reliable Japanese cars to our customers with full transparency. Whether you're looking for a family car or a sports car, we provide detailed information, verified images, and fair prices.
mission_desc2: With years of experience in car exports, we know exactly what customers need — trust, quality, and smooth transactions.
cta_work_desc: We are always looking for talented people to join our mission of making car buying easy for everyone.
contact_subtitle: Have a question or want to buy a car? Fill the form below, and we'll get back to you.
get_in_touch_desc: We'd love to hear from you! Our team is here to help you with car inquiries, pricing, and any other questions you might have.
purchase_desc: Contact us for inspection, shipping, and documentation.
